A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi could have been a good Star Wars movie. It was not. All of the parts were there\, but they could not connect because pointless plot contrivances got in the way. 

Most of the Resistance dies because Finn got a parking ticket and hired the wrong guy because he met him in space jail? Right. 

Leia can space jesus walk back to an airlock while Akbar dies offscreen? Ok.

Luke dies from being tired after a force-Skype call? Why not?

Snope dies from bad peripheral vision? Cool.

Phasma dies from Finn riding an elevator? Go ahead.

Chewie doesn't eat a roasted Porg? NO. This is unacceptable.  Porgs can be both cute and delicious. 

This could have been a streamlined movie about space battles and friends helping each other in their darkest moments. Instead it is Monaco Cat-Horse racing\, friend betraying\, pratfall having\, pile of Star Wars themed comedy sketches.
